gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This dataset contains soil classification and property data for a number of different sites around the Council, Alaska vicinity. These data consist of jpg files containing imagery and data tables and are previewable via the link at the top of the page.

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Palmer Research Center, 533 E. Fireweed Ave
